titleInfo.title: Closing the Capabilities Gap - Renegotiating social justice for the young

bibliographicCitation.dgps: Schäfer, H. (2011). Capabilities - From a Relationist Viewpoint. In O. Leßmann, H.-U. Otto & H. Ziegler (Hrsg.), Closing the Capabilities Gap - Renegotiating social justice for the young (S. 128-143). Opladen: Barbara Budrich.
